actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Resolution providing for certain employees to be subject to the House Employees Position Classification Act.

summary.text: Applies the House Employees Position Classification Act, which establishes rates of compensation for positions in the House of Representatives, to all positions of the House Press Gallery, of the Official Reporters of Debates and of the Official Reporters to Committees.

titles.title: Resolution providing for certain employees to be subject to the House Employees Position Classification Act.
